task.title: Removing Users
task.shortdesc: If you wish to remove a user from your project, you can do so from the Project dashboard.

step.cmd: In the Project members column, check the box of the user you would like to remove.
At the bottom of the column click on Remove.
step.info: If you do not select a user before you click on the Remove button, you will be taken to the Group overview page. You can select a user from the list and click on the Remove button at the bottom of the page to continue on to step 2.

step.cmd: You will be asked for confirmation before the user is removed. Click on Confirm.
